articles.title: Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Huichon Power Station
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Gives Field Guidance to Huichon Power Station
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the construction site of the Huichon Power Station making a leap forward. 
					 After acquainting himself with the progress made in the construction of the power station, he visited the surge tank construction site of KPA Guard Unit 210. 
					
					 He looked round the completed surge tank, a generator room and an iron pipe construction site to learn in detail about the progress made in the project.  
					
					 Watching completed large tunnel passages stretching far deep underground and giant structures of eternal value, he expressed great satisfaction over lots of work done by soldier-builders in a brief span of time and highly appreciated their labor success. 
					
					 It is pity that posterity would not be able to see these praiseworthy structures built by the soldier-builders at the cost of blood and sweat when the power station goes operational, he noted, adding that the feats the servicepersons performed by devotedly working for the prosperity of the country would be always remembered by the country and its people. 
					
					 Noting that inexhaustible is the mental power of the servicepersons of the People's Army, the fighters who are ready to flatten even a high mountain at one go if required by the party, he stressed that no force on earth can match this tremendous strength of the army single-mindedly united around it. 
					
					 Guard Unit 210 which performed distinguished feats in socialist construction in the past is creditably playing the role of vanguard and shock brigade in the construction of the power station, an outpost for building a thriving nation, he emphasized the shining feats the servicepersons of the unit performed by dedicating themselves to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the generations to come would always remain shining along with the history of the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 He commanded a bird's-eye view of construction site from an observation deck.
					
					 There is a bright prospect of completing the construction of the large-size Huichon Power Station before 2012 thanks to the devoted efforts of the constructors of the station including the soldier-builders who created the Huichon speed, a new Chollima speed, he said, extending a warm salute to all the builders who have waged an eye-catching drive by fully displaying the revolutionary soldier spirit and the revolutionary spirit of fortitude.
					
					 Looking at the literary and art works created by soldier-builders in the sites alive with a high pitched labor drive, he heard a lot of beautiful stories about servicepersons engaged in the construction.
					
					 He advanced important tasks that would serve as guidelines for finishing the construction of the station ahead of schedule. 
					
					 Noting that supply service is one of the main factors of boosting the speed of construction, he underscored the need to take deep care of the builders' living so that they might not feel any slightest inconvenience in it. 
					
					 He had a photo session with the soldier-builders of KPA Guard Unit 210.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Jong Un, vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the WPK, Kim Ki Nam and Hong Sok Hyong, members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Hui, member of the Political Bureau and department director of the C.C., the WPK, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae and Thae Jong Su, alternate members of the Political Bureau and secretaries of the C.C., the WPK, Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su, department directors of the NDC.

articles.title: Reunion of Separated Families from North and South Continues
articles.content:
Reunion of Separated Families from North and South Continues 
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south is going on at Mt. Kumgang resort.
					 Separated families and relatives from the north side had a reunion with those from the south side on Wednesday.
					
					 They shared kindred feelings, inquiring after the health of their families and relatives who were not able to join the reunion.
					
					 Through the reunion the separated families and relatives from the north and the south keenly realized that they cannot live separated from each other any longer but should terminate the tragic division as early as possible.
					
					 On the same day a banquet was given by the Central Committee of the DPRK Red Cross Society in honor of the separated families and relatives from the north and the south.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets WFP Executive Director
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets WFP Executive Director
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a conversation with Josette Sheeran, executive director of the World Food Programme, and her party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday when they paid a courtesy call on him.
					 Present there were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Claudia Von Roehl, representative of the WFP in the DPRK.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets WFP Executive Director
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets WFP Executive Director
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a conversation with Josette Sheeran, executive director of the World Food Programme, and her party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday when they paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets New Swedish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets New Swedish Ambassador
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a talk with Barbro Elm, new Swedish ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Commonwealth of Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Commonwealth of Dominica
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a message of greetings to Nicholas Liverpool, president of the Commonwealth of Dominica, on the occasion of the 32nd anniversary of its independence.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Valuable Life of Ardent Revolutionary
articles.content:
Valuable Life of Ardent Revolutionary
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- November 4 is the 105th birth anniversary of Kim Hyong Gwon, an indomitable revolutionary fighter with firm faith and mental spirit.
					His life was not long but it was characterized by infinite loyalty to the revolution, warm love for the country and people, indefatigable revolutionary spirit and strong will.
					
					He, educated in a patriotic and revolutionary way by his family in Mangyongdae from his childhood, was strong in the sense of patriotism and high in national and class consciousness.
					
					He became a member of the Paeksan Youth League, which was organized by President Kim Il Sung, and conducted energetic activities to expand it in vast areas adjacent to Mt. Paektu, including Fusong, Changbai, Linjiang and Antu.
					
					He, in the face of danger, was actively engaged in implanting the anti-Japanese, patriotic idea into the heart of many young people and encouraged them to join in the league.
					
					He also devotedly fought to attain arms from the enemy for a revolutionary armed unit formed by the President.
					
					On order of the President, he led an armed group of the Korean Revolutionary Army to the homeland and conducted political and military activities to rally local people. 
					
					In particular, the gun reports given by him in Phabal-ri played a big role in inspiring the Korean people with confidence in the liberation of the country.
					
					When he was arrested by the Japanese imperialists, he fully displayed the fortitude and stamina of an ardent patriot with boundless fidelity to the leader and firm faith in the revolution.

articles.title: Foodstuff, Daily Necessities Production on Rise
articles.content:
Foodstuff, Daily Necessities Production on Rise
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- Workers and technicians of foodstuff and daily necessities industries have taken the lead in the effort for the improvement of the people's living after greeting the historic conference of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th anniversary of the WPK with increased production.
					 The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory, encouraged by General Secretary Kim Jong Il's August field guidance, has boosted the output of cookies with its production processes updated in a short span of time with the help of scientists.
					
					 The Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory and the Kyongryon Aeguk Soda Pop Mill have topped their monthly targets and steadily improved the quality of products on the basis of latest science and technologies and through a mass technological innovation movement.
					
					 Foodstuff factories across the country, including the Kanggye Essential Foodstuff Factory, Hoeryong Essential Foodstuff Factory, Changsong Foodstuff Factory and Samjiyon Soy and Bean Paste Factory, have increased the variety of essential foodstuffs and processed foodstuffs with locally available raw materials.
					
					 The Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory, in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and the spirit of devoted service for the people, has pushed ahead with technological updating, keeping all the production processes operated at full capacity.
					
					 The Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory has introduced valuable technical findings in production to improve the quality of the products.

articles.title: US and Its Followers' Confab on MD Slammed
articles.content:
US and Its Followers' Confab on MD Slammed 
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The United States and its followers were recently reported to have been closeted together to agree on the establishment of a new missile defence system.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The U.S. bellicose quarters cried out for building a new missile shield in a bid to protect their allies from "threat" from someone, claiming that it is potential. This is sheer sophism little short of making profound confusion of the right and wrong. 
					
					 The U.S. talk about the fictitious "threat" from the DPRK and Iran is no more than a fabrication made by it to justify its arms buildup and realize its ambition to dominate the world by force of arms.
					
					 In fact, there is no chance of success for the MD. Assertions and views skeptical about the MD are heard from the U.S.
					
					 Under this condition, the U.S. requires pretexts and grounds for justifying the arms buildup including the MD and the enforcement of policy of strength.
					
					 To this end the U.S. cooked up the story about "threat" from someone.
					
					 The U.S. missile shield is being built in areas east and west of Eurasia.
					
					 It is the invariable strategy of the U.S. imperialists to lay a military siege to the "potential rivals" challenging them, contain and pressurize them by force of arms in a bid to dominate the world.
					
					 The U.S. is the real criminal posing threat to the DPRK and Iran, its victims. Yet it is behaving like a brigand to groundlessly pass the buck for the threat to these countries. 
					
					 Such method can never work in this bright world.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Vow to Struggle against Discrimination against Workers
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Vow to Struggle against Discrimination against Workers 
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Seoul on October 30 under the sponsorship of the Committee for Commemorating the 40th Anniversary of Death of Young Jon Thae Il.
					 It was attended by at least 6,000 members of civic and social organizations grouping people of various strata including the Confederation of Trade Unions, the Citizens' Solidarity for Democratic Society and the Solidarity for Progress.
					
					 Speakers said at the meeting that the irregular workers have staged a strenuous struggle against the anti-worker policy pursued by the "government".
					
					 They declared the will of the workers to go united and wage a positive struggle to build a society without irregular jobs and a society free from discrimination against workers in the future. 
					
					 Then followed an art performance in commemoration of martyr Jon Thae Il.
					
					 The Confederation of Trade Unions held a meeting of workers for the abolition of irregular jobs on the same day.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Unwarranted Suppression of Teachers Affiliated to Jongyojo under Fire
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Unwarranted Suppression of Teachers Affiliated to Jongyojo under Fire 
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- At least 3,700 representatives of schools affiliated to the Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) released a declaration on Oct. 28 denouncing the wrong action taken by the puppet ministry of Education, Science and Technology.
					 The declaration accused the ministry of working hard to implement as early as possible the disciplinary measures such as firing teachers affiliated to the union.
					
					 Recalling that the ministry is working hard to enforce an unwarranted measure as regards the matriculation despite the opposition of people of different circles, the declaration said that if this measure is put into force, it will spark off disorder and conflict at schools and increase the education fee, imposing a heavier burden on the students and their parents.
					
					 It demanded the ministry stop its unwarranted suppression of teachers affiliated to the union and roll back its biased educational policy.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Mexico
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism released the 47th issue of its bulletin titled "Incarnation of comradeship".
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of General Secretary Kim Jong Il and edited articles under various titles.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Loyalty and obligation" said that Kim Jong Il's noble comradeship found a most vivid manifestation in his loyalty and obligation towards President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who accomplished the cause of perpetuating the memory of Kim Il Sung for the first time in history, is standing in the van of all the people's general offensive for building a thriving socialist nation, the President's lifetime desire, now making dynamic progress amid the world attention, it noted.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Revolutionary forerunners" gave a detailed account of the fact that Kim Jong Il highly estimated the feats performed by the revolutionaries of the elder generation in their struggle and underscored the need for the young generation not to forget their revolutionary spirit and work style but to learn from them.
					
					 It introduced in detail the fact that there are the revolutionary martyrs cemetery and the patriotic martyrs cemetery in Pyongyang and that many areas, universities, institutions and enterprises are named after revolutionary martyrs.
					
					 The bulletin in articles titled "Love and trust" and "Songun comrades" told stories that Kim Jong Il regarded servicepersons as comrades with whom he should share destiny, showing warm loving care for them, and put them forward as a driving force for the Songun revolutionary cause and vanguard fighters devotedly defending the leader. Socialist Korea is sure to win one victory after another thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Il, the incarnation of comradeship, it added.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, November 3 (KCNA) -- One March day in Juche 98 (2009) General Secretary Kim Jong Il visited Ryongrim County, Jagang Province, early in the morning to go round the dam construction site of Huichon Power Station No. 1.
					 Reaching the site, he said that it was still chilly in the area although spring had come and that he was afraid of the soldier-builders' working conditions. An official told him that the leader was the first to visit the construction site, noting that even officials of the Cabinet had not yet come.
					
					 Listening to him, Kim Jong Il said that he had fallen into a habit of making long and rugged journeys to visit construction sites ahead of others. And he noted that it was revolutionaries' spirit and work attitude to unhesitatingly advance through thorny path formidable for others.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il visita campo de construccion de Central de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il visita campo de construccion de Central de Huichon
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, realizo la visita de orientacion sobre el campo de construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon donde se dan grandes saltos.
					  Tras averiguar como marcha esta obra, el Dirigente visito el lugar donde la Unidad Guardia 210 del EPC construye el tanque regulador de presion hidraulica.
					
					  El Dirigente se entero en detalles del estado de construccion recorriendo el tanque regular ya completado, la sala de generador electrico y el sitio de construccion de los conductos de hierro.
					
					  Al contemplar las ya concluidas galerias de gran tamano y otras construcciones gigantescas, se puso muy contento de que los militares hayan realizado muchos trabajos en un corto plazo y aprecio mucho sus exitos de trabajo.
					
					  Es una lastima que las generaciones futuras no puedan ver estas orgullosas creaciones, en que estan impregnados la sangre y el sudor de los constructores militares cuando fuera inaugurada esta central hidroelectrica, dijo y apunto que la patria y el pueblo no olvidaran nunca los meritos de ellos que trabajaron abnegadamente por la prosperidad de la patria.
					
					  Indico que es inagotable el poderio espiritual de los militares del EPC, luchadores capaces de cumplir a costa de la vida todo lo que les demande el partido y agrego que no hay nadie en este mundo que pueda superar esa gran fuerza del EPC unido monoliticamente en torno al partido.
					
					  La unidad 210 acumulo anteriormente meritos extraordinarios en la construccion del socialismo y cumple magnificamente el papel de vanguardia y brigada en la construccion de esta central que es obra de mayor prioridad en la edificacion de una gran potencia prospera, recalco.
					
					　Prosiguio que brillara eternamente en la historia de construccion de la gran potencia prospera el merito orgulloso de los uniformados de la unidad que lucharon dedicando todo lo suyo por la prosperidad de la patria y la felicidad de todas las generaciones venideras.
					
					　Acto seguido, el Dirigente presencio el panorama del campo de construccion desde el mirador.
					
					　Dijo que gracias a la abnegada lucha de los constructores, incluyendo los militares, creadores de la velocidad de Huichon, la nueva de Chollima, quedaron abiertas las perspectivas de terminar la construccion de esta central enorme antes del ano 2012.
					
					　Envio su cordial saludo a todos los constructores quienes trabajan con gran entusiasmo manifestando el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de lucha tenaz.
					
					　Leyendo las obras literarias y artisticas creadas por los constructores militares en sus agitados talleres de trabajo, escucho los innumerables episodios de la conducta admirable de ellos surgidos en el proceso de construccion.
					
					　El Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia para terminar con adelanto la construccion de la central.
					
					　La intendencia constituye uno de los factores principales que posibilitan aumentar la velocidad de la obra, senalo y puntualizo que se debe atender esmeradamente las condiciones de vida de los constructores para que ellos no tengan ni la minima incomodidad.
					
					　Al final, se fotografio junto con los constructores militares de la Unidad 210.
					
					　En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Jong Un, vicepresidente de la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Ki Nam y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico  y secretarios del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae y Thae Jong Su, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su, jefes de departamento del Comite de Defensa Nacional.

articles.title: Continua en el monte Kumgang encuentro de familiares separados
articles.content:
Continua en el monte Kumgang encuentro de familiares separados
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Continua en el monte Kumgang el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					　Los familiares y parientes de la parte Norte se reunieron el dia 3 con los de la parte Sur compartiendo la fraternidad y preguntando como estaban los que no pudieron venir.
					
					　A traves del encuentro, ellos volvieron a corroborar que la nacion coreana no puede vivir mas dividida y hay que acabar cuanto antes con la division, tragedia nacional.
					
					　Este dia, el Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea ofrecio una recepcion en honor de los citados al encuentro.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a Nicholas Liverpool
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje a Nicholas Liverpool
 Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 3 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de Commonwealth de Dominica, Nicholas Liverpool, en ocasion del 32o aniversario de la independencia de este pais.
					  El remitente expresa al destinatario la conviccion de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas las relaciones de amistad entre Corea y Commonwealth de Dominica y le desea exitos en la labor por el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Va en aumento la produccion de  alimentos y articulos de uso diario
articles.content:
Va en aumento la produccion de  alimentos y articulos de uso diario
Pyongyang, 3 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Los obreros y tecnicos de la industria de alimentos y articulos de uso diario, que celebraron con grandes exitos laborales la historica Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el 65o aniversario de la fundacion de esta organizacion politica, marchan en la delantera de la ofensiva general para mejorar la vida del pueblo ampliando los exitos de produccion.
					  La Fabrica de Elaboracion de Cereales de Pyongyang, visitada en agosto pasado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, aumenta la produccion de confites en cooperacion con los cientificos y en base a los exitos alcanzados en la modernizacion realizada en un corto plazo.
					
					  La Fabrica de Alimentos Taedonggang y la Fabrica de Refresco Gaseoso Kyongryon Aeguk introdujeron activamente en la produccion los exitos cientificos y tecnicos de punta y activaron el movimiento masivo de innovacion tecnica.
					
					　De esta manera, sobrecumplen el plan mensual elevando la calidad de los alimentos.
					
					  Entre tanto, las Fabricas de Alimentos Basicos de Kanggye y de Hoeryong, la Fabrica de Alimentos de Changsong, la Fabrica de Salsa y Pasta de Soya de Samjiyon, y las otras alimentarias a lo largo del pais diversifican las variedades de sus productos con las materias primas locales contribuyendo asi a la mejora de la vida alimentaria de los trabajadores.
					
					  Por otra parte, los funcionarios y obreros de la Fabrica de Cosmeticos de Pyongyang aceleran activamente la renovacion tecnica y ponen en pleno funcionamiento todos los procesos productivos trabajando con el espiritu revolucionario de autoconfianza y la determinacion de servir abnegadamente al pueblo.
					
					  Los obreros y tecnicos de la Fabrica de Articulos de Uso Diario de Pyongyang, que se esfuerzan por satisfacer la demanda material del pueblo, elevan el nivel de habilidad y ponen en practica los ingeniosos y valiosos inventos, de modo que se mejorara la calidad de los productos.
